name: DEVIL FRUIT
description:
Sound made with TidalCycles
Visuals made with Hydra
1080*1080 35s mp4

src(o0).scale(1.005,1.015,1.015).color(.5,1.2,2.8).saturate(0.65)
.modulate(shape(20,.3,.1).rotate(.1,.1),.1)
.blend(
shape(2,.02,.2).color(2.8,1.1,.7)
.modulateScrollY(noise(3).rotate(.1,-.06),.7,.3)
.modulateRotate(osc(10,.08).modulateKaleid(noise(4)),-1.1,.9)
.mult(shape(20,0.65,0.1).modulateScale(noise(3),.2))
.contrast(1.5)
)
.out()
